an10.187:1.1: “I will teach you the principle that has suffering as outcome, and that which has happiness as outcome. …
an10.187:1.3: And what is the principle whose outcome is suffering?
an10.187:1.6: This is the principle whose outcome is suffering.
an10.187:2.1: And what is the principle whose outcome is happiness?
an10.187:2.4: This is the principle whose outcome is happiness.”
